modName: Dacia Persius Follower by Gman749 - CBBE and 7base
summary: Adds former Imperial soldier and current freelancer Dacia Persius
descriptionHtml:
Back after a hiatus :) this time up, powerful and strong- willed former Imperial Legionnaire, Dacia Persius! Also for the first time,  including both CBBE and 7base (UNP compatible)

She can be found at the Four Shields Inn in Dragon Bridge. Her default is Imperial Heavy armor. 

[img]https://i.imgur.com/qEzIeMd.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/1HgiTsc.jpg[/img]


Name - Dacia Persius
Gender - Female
Race - Imperial 
Birthplace - Anvil, Cyrodiil
Sexuality - straight
Status - single 
Height - 5' 11
Weight - 175 lbs
Occupation - Sword for hire

[img]https://i.imgur.com/DiKLAHJ.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/BgKxFFF.jpg[/img]

Background

Dacia was one of the Empire's finest soldiers,  a force of nature with her sword and shield.  But  the Empire's acceptance of the White-Gold Concordat, plus their non - involvement in the defense of Hammerfell, which in her mind cost her partner his life,  led to her departure from the Imperial army. she couldn't stomach the thought of defending an institution that bent their knee to tyranny,  so instead she relocated to Skyrim, working as a soldier for hire. with the Civil War intensifying however,  and dragons suddenly appearing, her concern over keeping Tamriel safe might lead her to collaborate with her former commander,  Legate Rikke, once more.. 


Thanks to all the excellent mod Authors of Skyrim Nexus, the incredible talent in the Image Gallery and especially,  my friends at the Art Fletcher Discord server who helped assist me with troubleshooting :) love you guys!


Credits
